name: Heist Cream
description:
Heist Cream is a short little game about chasing down an ice cream truck to get some ice cream. That's it. 

Disclaimer: This was a game meant for me to learn how to use a game engine so I can make the games I want to. This includes doing everything that goes into the game so I can get a basic knowledge of how to do everything. This especially helps for future projects, making it easier for me to communicate my needs, for those developing with me. For other projects, I'm getting others to do what I can't do well or at all. 

The game isn't complete or the most balanced, optimized, or enjoyable. Honestly, I don't expect it to run very nicely. I'm not experienced with optimization and anything I tried made the game either run worse or look terrible, also due to my lack of experience. While working on other games, I want to work on this game more, but it depends on how things go with those projects. Any time you spend playing my little game, I hope you enjoy.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Sprint - Shift

Pause - Escape
